General.Name: Solegreen Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Solegreen Ltd engages in the set-up, development, planning, construction, financing and management of power generation facilities using renewable energy in Israel and internationally. The company was formerly known as Procognia (Israel) Ltd. and changed its name to Solegreen Ltd in January 2015. Solegreen Ltd was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.
